item.title: 备忘录的安装记录
item.author: hrbhot@gmail.com (Yin)
item.description: 1. 安装go hugo git clone https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo.git cd hugo go install 2. 设置主题 git submodule add https://github.com/panr/hugo-theme-hello-friend.git themes/hello echo 'theme = "hello"' >> config.toml 3. 发布文章 hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 4. 启动预览 hugo server hugo server -D # 草稿 draft 为true的文章
